settings.heading: A BEAUTIFUL YOU, INSIDE AND OUT
settings.title: Weight Loss
settings.body: The amount of information available in the modern era about weight loss is as plentiful as it is conflicting. To make matters more difficult, what works for one person may not work for the next. At Balanced Aesthetics Medspa, our weight loss program can help you find your personal weight loss technique with support every step of the way.

settings.text: Your journey to a healthier version of yourself begins with a comprehensive consultation with a Balanced Aesthetics expert. We’ll take initial body measurements with an advanced body measuring machine, go over your current nutrition behaviors, possibly conduct lab work, and create a customized plan. We help you understand your current lifestyle and the habits you’ve developed, retrain these habits as necessary, and work together to instill a healthy outlook on health/wellness and body image.

Because every client is different, every weight loss program will be different, with unique timelines and outcomes. What you can count on is the Balanced Aesthetics team’s ultimate support in your weight loss and management efforts. We help you pinpoint and change bad nutrition habits, adopt healthy habits, and we cheer you on as you achieve milestone after milestone in your journey to becoming a healthier, happier version of yourself. Losing weight can be one of the most frustrating, difficult battles you fight in your lifetime. It doesn’t have to be with the right information, supplementation, and support in your corner.

settings.question: Which Weight Loss Program Works Best?
settings.answer: This is a difficult question to answer because each client differs in genetics, habits, and personality. For some clients, difficulties losing weight stem from poor nutrition habits. For others, it’s a matter of hormones and vitamins (or lack thereof) slowing down the breakdown of fat. Your weight loss program at Balanced Aesthetics is personal, focusing on building your strengths, improving your weaknesses, and providing you with the support you need to achieve healthy weight loss for the long term. Depending upon your individual goals, treatment may involve nutrition coaching, wellness supplements, peptide therapy, and body contouring treatments to improve your body’s natural balance and prime you for good, sustained weight management. No one needs another fad diet. If it’s time to get off the weight-loss merry-go-round, Balanced Aesthetics is ready to help.

settings.question: What is Weight Loss Treatment Like?
settings.answer:
Your plan will be unique to you, but overall, we help you establish good wellness habits and minimize and break the bad habits you’ve fallen into. We also boost your potential success using wellness supplements and/or a peptide regimen aimed at managing your weight and priming your body for fat loss. Some of these regimens may include:

HCG (PREGNYL) WEIGHT MANAGEMENT SUPPLEMENT

If you recognize HCG as human chorionic gonadotropin, a hormone typically produced during pregnancy, you may be surprised to learn it’s not only beneficial during pregnancy.
HCG has recently been linked to fat loss because it boosts metabolism and anatomical weight loss processes.

When this supplement is combined with a low-calorie diet, you may experience fast weight loss thanks to increased metabolism, averaging 1-2 pounds of unwanted fat per day.

ULTRA BURN (METHIONINE/INOSITOL/CHOLINE) +B1 (THIAMINE +B12

For some clients, the increased energy necessary to lose weight just isn’t there to begin with. That’s where Ultra Burn comes in. This combination of ingredients includes fat metabolizers, acids, and B vitamins to enhance the liver’s performance with fat breakdown. This increases fat loss while preventing fat buildup.

Ultra Burn:

• Detoxes the liver

• Promotes liver and heart health

• Redistributes body fat

• Reduces bad cholesterol

• Promotes good, restful sleep

• Breaks down carbs for energy

• Increases metabolism

• Maintains the body’s metabolic pathways for proper fat and protein processing

Reduce stored fat, burn dietary fat, increase metabolism and energy levels, and improve your mood and motivation. Ultra Burn resets your body’s functions for optimum weight loss.

settings.question: Is There Any Downtime?
settings.answer: It’s normal to experiencesome injection site tenderness, swelling, or redness, but these typically fade on their own in a few hours.

settings.text: No one wants to have their lips look overdone, too puffy, or asymmetrical, so having a professional perform your lip enhancement is vital to the success of your outcome. Our talented Aesthetics Injectors have been specially trained and are uniquely qualified in the art of lip enhancement with JUVÉDERM® lip fillers. There’s nowhere better to achieve soft, plush lips that compliment your features than Balanced Aesthetics Medspa.
